price: 1. Alif, lâm, râ.(1) oyo wana ezali nde mikapo mia buku mpe kurani ya polele.
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
